Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher feedback is structured and specific to your work, while GenAI may be generic.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: As above, GenAI may be less specific and unreliable, while teacher feedback can always be relied on to be accurate.
